721678f-a.text:
76 (partially shown), and 78 Monroe Street, west of and adjoining the S.W. corner of Pike Street. (No. 78 is a stable, seen being demolished). The corner appears as a clearance created by the demolition of a 1-story
frame and a 3-story brick building.
March 21, 1937.
P. L. Sperr.
